org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.igfs

Class IgfsEvictionFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.igfs.IgfsEvictionFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, EvictionFilter

    public class IgfsEvictionFilter
extends Object
implements EvictionFilter
    IGFS eviction filter which will not evict blocks of particular files.
